intro: Psychotria chitariana, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers, which are often clustered in dense inflorescences. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of rainforests. Psychotria chitariana is also noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
